item.title: 019 - Too Much of a Workout
item.description: Sometimes, trying to make a machine ‘smart’ makes it dumb. There’s a perfectly fine analog exercise bike next to it. It won’t entertain you while you’re working out, but maybe you don’t need to be exercised while you work out. (Pelaton would argue with me here). But as Blaise Pascal wrote: ‘All of humanity’s problems stem from man’s inability to sit quietly in a room alone.” I wonder what Blaise Pascal would say about entertainment/exercise bikes.
